text:
Ahh I know what you mean, one good thing with the industry is it’s always flexible for people who want to try new stuff!

Sorry for the delay in getting back to you. I had just handed in my notice at DNEG so had a very busy few weeks wrapping up on the project I was on! I’m gonna be starting at a smaller place called Automatik on Monday! It feels really weird to be leaving Dneg but it’s the right thing for me right now!

As for getting into Dneg I totally think you could! They were hiring for a tech checker in the TV department recently and that’s the way I got myself into an artist role so there are always was in, it’s just about finding them and being in the right place at the right time!
Yeah, I think I just need to look into roles more. I’ve never heard of Automatik I’ll have a look into them!
